description.value:
The Meandering Tune
Â 
Bellerod is a deity who advocates for the indulgence in the pleasures of life - drinking, merriment, and the arts, all the while supporting the notion of expanding horizons through travel and experiences. This makes Bellerod a great patron god for wandering minstrels and bards. While Bellerod's tenets champion travel, he does make exceptions for those who provide succor to travelers in his name. As such, it is not common for roadside inns to show devotion to The Meandering Tune, especially since a weary bard can provide some much needed entertainment in these establishments.

Edicts

  • Travel the roads spreading the heroes' tales
  • Drink 'till there's nothing left

Anathema

  • Settling down for too long
  • Living a life devoid of art

Areas of Concern

  • Art
  • Music
  • Food
  • Alcohol
